name: Sense (Rud156)
description:
Sense is a game made for the LD45 game jam within a span of 72 hrs. 

We set out to build a game which caused the player to explore. But with a twist. The world is not clear in the beginning. The less you kill your character, the less the character will listen to you. You have to have FAITH.

Controls: WASD and Arrow Keys

Headphones Recommended

Credits:

Avinash Masih (Art)

Rudrangshu Nandi (Programming)

Unity Asset Store (For Effects and Audio)
